name: Bruce Lawson
bio: Bruce is a freelance consultant on accessibility and web standards. Previously, he was in Developer Relation for Opera Software. He co-authored the book 'Introducing HTML5' and was on the committee that drafted the British Standard for commissioning accessible websites.
